com.eco.bio7.rbridge

Class Bio7Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.rbridge.Bio7Grid

  • public class Bio7Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives access to the Table component (based on the Nebula Grid Widget) of Bio7.
    Author:
    Bio7
